column2: How easy it is to access Dark mode?
column4: How is the new Change address option?
column5: Is there a chance to place your order to a wrong address now?
column6: What do you like most in this new Home Page?
column7: You like this new Quick Add to favorites feature?
column8: To stop endless scrolling - No.of products and no.of Pages were listed , Did you like that?
column9:
We have made following changes? Please Evaluate our redesign of Amazon shopping app. You can mention which feature you liked most or your feedback/opinion?
User Pain Points Adressed:
1. Dark Mode Setting added
2.Preventing Endless Scrolling with pagination
3. Favorites/Wishlist on Home page
4. Quick Favorite button on the Search Grid
5. Accessible Address Change during checkout
6. Homepage navigation made easy - all needful items at one place 
7. overwhelming info and ads were removed where not necessary 

Note: Comment the feature number(1-7) which you liked the most, you can say none if you like nothing.
